info.author: Bontor Humala
info.description: This project tries to implement a client library based on Python for Xively IoT platform. Using MQTT is expected to increase response time and save costly communication bandwidth
info.name: xivelymqtt
info.summary: A port of Xively library that uses MQTT instead of HTTP as data transport
info.html_description: This project tries to implement a client library based on Python for Xively IoT platform. Using MQTT is expected to increase response time and save costly communication bandwidth
